title: Critics mock liberal fact-checking site for rating reporting on Biden crack pipe funding 'mostly false' - Fox News
content:
1. Critics mock liberal fact-checking site for rating reporting on Biden crack pipe funding 'mostly false'  Fox News
  2. Trust Index: Does White House plan to battle opioids involve ‘smoking kits’ that contain pipes?  WJXT News4JAX
  3. Biden's plan to fund crack pipe distribution is 'stupidity': Sen. Kennedy  Fox News
  4. The racist ‘crack pipe’ panic and the White House’s shameful capitulation | Opinion  The Philadelphia Inquirer
  5. The 'Southern strategy' goes south  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Critics mocked liberal fact-checking site Snopes following it rating reporting on the Biden administration's crack pipe funding as "mostly false," despite also admitting they were going to be be distributed through an HHS grant program.
